name: MathDice
description:
This game is made with the Unity engine.

This is a small idea I got while in school. What if there was a puzzle game that requires using math to pass levels?

Since this is currently a prototype, a spawn menu is provided. Numbers from 0 to 9 only work. Math symbols need to be typed like this: "+" = "plus"

You need to put the math numbers and symbols in a valid order, the equals needs to be placed after the numbers and the symbols. If the equals turns to a number, then you got a result.

The game is slightly unplayable due to weird issues of the unity build thing, hopefully I can find a way to fix it sometime soon
